text:
Sorry guys, but if I use serverless functions to make calls to GraphQL, do I still have the limit of 500k points per minute? What about for REST APIs? I'd like to add that this would be used internally within HubSpot. I'm considering using serverless to build a reactive management system because GraphQL in server-side rendering isn't very dynamic.
cc <@U01QVR44MEY> <@U03FJQPSC0Y>
Yeah the limits are the same no matter how you call the graphql endpoint

Thanks a lot, Carter. How would you go about creating a dynamic reserved area on HubSpot? Because the GraphQL limit is a bit restrictive.
I know that if I choose to go with server-side rendering, the queries donâ€™t cost, but the problem is that the reserved area would become a bit old-fashioned due to the loading times (even simply for pagination, etc.) <@U01QVR44MEY>
